80a7: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ / de bzhin du sbyar te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// yang dag pa'i mtha'i ni yang dag pa'i
80a8: mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ / shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ tshe dang ldan pa

80b1: rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mthi bar gyi rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i ra
80b2: bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha' bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// tshor ba dang
80b3: 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral bar rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
80b4: gzhan yang gzugs ni gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar na yang dag pa'i
80b5: mtha'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ / mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
80b6: sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
80b7: dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar chos thams cad ma skyes shing byung ba med pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus
80b8: smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad ma skyes shing nges par byung ba med pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba dang nges par 'byung

81a1: pa mami dmigs so/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye ba dang 'byung ba me migs so// de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mchir
81a2: par ni yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/ de la skye ba dang nges par 'byung ba mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med
81a3: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba yin no/ / de rdo lta ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag
81a4: pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur
81a5: ba de lta de ltar 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ / zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang / gti mug dang ldan pa dang / nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang / rgyu dang g.yo dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang ldan pa dang / chags pa dang ldan pa dang / lta ba dang /
81a6: ldan pa'i sems ma bskyed do// de 'dod chags kyi sems pa skyed cing / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang rgyu dang / g.yo dang phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / chags pa dang lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems ma skyed pas/ nam yang ma'i mang la du ma s+ya zhe
81a7: rtag par rgyu dang rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ / sems can yongs sa smin par bya ba'i tshad ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song rnams su ma sbya'o// de sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs sa dag par byed cing /
81a8: sangs rgyas kyi gang nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mdon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar dra nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar ma 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra ba

81b1: de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang phan yon de dag thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la brtson pa ma gtang bar smad par bya ste/ cha dang ldan pa shA ra 'ab byang chub sems dpa' sems
81b2: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol duphyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba yin no/ / shes rab kyi pha ral daphyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las// kan tra d+hU bze sbyangs kyi le'u zhes bye/ brgyad pa'o/
81b3: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa gal te thabs la mi mkhas pas gzugs la spyod na mtshan pa
81b4: la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so//
81b5: gal te gzugs la rtag ces bgyi ba 'am mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la rtag ces
81b6: bgyi ba'am mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// gal te gzugs la bde zhes bgyi ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te/
81b7: tshe ra ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bde zhes bgyi ba'am sdug pasngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs bdag ces bgyi ba'am bdag ma mchis shes babya bar spyod na/
81b8: mtshan ma la spyod pa lags gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag ces bgyi ba'am/ bdag ma mchis shes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs la ni zhes

82a1: pa 'am/ ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshong ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la zhi zhes bgyi ba 'am ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
82a2: pa lags/ gal te gzugs la dben zhes bgyi ba 'am mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dben zhes bgyi ba 'am me dben
82a3: zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi
82a4: mkhas pas/ gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / mig lnga dang / stobs rnams dang /
82a5: mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar dag la spyod na mtshan mi spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
82a6: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa gal te 'di snyam du bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// snyam du sems na/ dmigs pa la spyod pa lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan
82a7: mnyid la spyod pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gal te 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sgomapa
82a8: yin no/ / snyam du sems na/ de 'di la spyod pa lags te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bgyi ba lags so// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir

82b1: 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
82b2: la spyod pa 'di ltar gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ tshong ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin//
82b3: tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin te/ de ni de'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / bsdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde
82b4: ba dang / 'khrug pa byed pa yin no// zhes kho bo smra'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gal te mig la gnas shing kun du shes te mos//
82b5: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ gzugs la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg bya dang / chos la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la
82b6: gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ gal te
82b7: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ gal te rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis blud pa'i tshor ba bde ba
82b8: 'am/ drug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ gal te rna ba dang / !dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'am/ drug bsngal ba

83a1: 'ag/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ba yin pa la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcurtsa bdun la gnas shing kun du shes te mas/ mig lnga dang / mngon par shes pa
83a2: dru dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / mad med pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'dag pa bzhi dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bas bcul gnas gang kun drags te mas/ sa
83a3: rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la gnas shing kun du shes te mos na/ mngon par 'du byed pa la
83a4: spyad pa yin te/ mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na pa dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag las yongs su mi 'thar zhing / sdug bsngal la sogs
83a5: pa las yongs su mi 'grol lo zhes kho ba smra'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rangasangs rgyas kyis mngon sum du bya ba'i skal ba yang med na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
83a6: rdzogs par 'chang rgyabar ltag la 'gyur te/ de ni gnas med do// me dang ldan pa d+hA ri bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen tshogs ra kyi rol du phyin pa la de lta spyod pa ni thabs la mi mkhas par rig par byeg/ tra bris smras pas
83a7: ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas par rig par bya/ rab 'byor gyis spras pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis
83a8: rol du phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ gzugs la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/ tsherab dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i

83b1: mtshan ma la mi spyod/ gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin du gzugs mi rtag ce bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / ni zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar mi
83b2: spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes
83b3: bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
83b4: rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben
83b5: zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
83b6: la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs med gzugs las gud na
83b7: yang stong pa nyid med de gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la stong pa nyid kyang gzugs yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yini/ stong panyi
83b8: las gud na yang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du/ khams

84a1: nga/ la pa zu gas / sa sa/ dag
84a2: pa rnams dang / ma ma nasas dang / ses pa dgapa ga da pa dang gyis pa sa nga dag ya da na pa ma sa
84a3: masamamacam rnams pad/ sas ldanams las cang na yang stong pa nyid pa dade/ gang panyid 'dasas rgya kyi bdapas pan pa/ sa sa da nyid pa / dang na pag
84a4: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa na thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA bi bya byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba shes rab kyi par yang byin pa la da ka spyod pa na/ blan ma
84a5: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba'i skal pa yod pa yin no/ / shes bkyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de gal te chos 'ag shig las lenan/ shes rab kyi pa ma du phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// las ma
84a6: len na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ / khas len kyang len la/ khas ma len kyang mi len na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khas len pa yang ma yin/ khas ma len pa yang ma yin na yang shes
84a7: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ / shA ri'i bris smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas ci'i phyir khas mi len/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar
84a8: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bo nyid med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dngos po med pa'i phyir te/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa'asems dpa' chen po shes

84b1: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/ mi spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/ spyod kyang spyod la/ mi spyod kyang mi spyod de zhes bya bar khas mi len/ spyod pa yang ma yin/ mi spyod pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar khas mi len to//
84b2: de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du kha ngang chud cang ma blangs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin no// rnam pa thams cad
84b3: mkhyen pa nyid de yang chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ste/ rgya che ba phal du
84b4: bya ba/ tshad med pa des pa mi 'phrogs pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
84b5: rdzogs par 'tshad bya'o/ / shA ri'i bris smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'ad kho nas gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myu nga phran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chad rgya'am/ 'on //
84b6: ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis kyang 'thar/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA bting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis gnas pas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa myur du zan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub me na pa
84b7: sab sa smras pa/ dang napa pa nga/ bzhags dgags gnas pa/ byang nams pa sa dpa phes pa pa can pa byung nga za med pa yang dag pa phags pa gang ma rdzogs par
84b8: de / mthar gyis thub pa/ dang ldan pas babyang du ba ba ma ma dpa bam dpa' na pa nams sa tad nga 'gad pa sar 'tha bshes pa pa mad/ tid nge lan de pa gnas par byang rgyabs pa sadapa' la ba da

85a1: chen po ni myur du tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
85a2: zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las shin du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgyu
85a3: gtsug rnam par lta ba'i zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la
85a4: 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po la shin du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyam par
85a5: bzhag pa'i gnas la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzini dang / nges pa'i tshig la
85a6: gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshig bla dgas la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brjod pa med pa/
85a7: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan
85a8: rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po rtog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par sgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snrelag zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge

85b1: 'dzin dang rin po che spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la rten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med pa zhes bya ba'i
85b2: ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dag pa dam pa zhes
85b3: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'ad dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba byid pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang / thog gi sman ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi 'pham pa zhes
85b4: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma'i sgron ma
85b5: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bya ba byed pa zhes
85b6: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i/ nge 'dzin dang / sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ti
85b7: nge 'dzin dang / rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyis 'phags shing
85b8: rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab du 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba

86a1: zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin dang / dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzir dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin dang / mngangs par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
86a2: dang / gnas pa med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab ri'i med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i
86a3: ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa
86a4: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting
86a5: nge 'dzin dang / nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa cig
86a6: tu byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa dong ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtogs pas srid pa'i mun pa thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brda' dang sgra thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
86a7: sgra dbyangs kyi yig thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me sgron zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan nyid yongs su spyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams
86a8: cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bde ba dang mug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa'i tha ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi blo gras zhes bya ba'i ting nge

86b1: 'dzin dang / yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'thun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma
86b2: med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba nya ba'i 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten thams
86b3: cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ji nge 'dzin dang / sgra med pa dang sgra dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba
86b4: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la brtan pa med pa la brdzun pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
86b5: lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
86b6: dag yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems/
86b7: dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshar rtsa ste/ gang la skabs pas/ byang chub
86b8: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang gzungs kyi sgo tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod do/ / de nas sangs rgyas

87a1: kyi mthus/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rab 'byor gyis yang 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu a la la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa de ni sngon gyi
87a2: bzhi ni gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stan cing / da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de
87a3: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / byang chub sems dpa'
87a4: sems dpa' chen po de lung ston par rig par bya ste/ tadi nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa des ni ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // bdag ni snyoms par zhugs so// bdag ni snyoms par 'jug go// bdag ni/
87a5: snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang med de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad med cing mi 'byung ngo // shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang
87a6: ldan pa rab 'byor ci ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan du yod dam/ / rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
87a7: bu de ni med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan zhing / byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin la ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang
87a8: chub sems dpa' yin pa'i phyir ro/ / shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhanam

87b1: yan la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yani/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid ti 'dzin yin na/ ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni ma yin no// shA ri'i
87b2: bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu des ce ting nge 'dzin de dag kun du shes sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kun du shes pa med do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ltar kun du shes pa med/ rab
87b3: 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed pa ltar ro// shA ri'i bu smras pa/ ji ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ chos thams cad med pa'i phyir de ltar ting nge 'dzin de dag la rnam par rtog par
87b4: mi byed de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rigs kyi bu des ting nge 'dzin de dag rnam par mi shes shing / kun du mi shes so// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ des rnam par mi shes shing kun du mi shes/ rab
87b5: 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin de dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de med pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par mi shes shing kun du mi shes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes
87b6: bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor ji ltar ngas nyan thos nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu snyan pa khyod kyis bshad pa ni de yin te/ tshig de dag legs par smras pa ni legs so legs so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
87b7: chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar slab par bya'o/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin
87b8: pa la de ltar slab par bya'o/ / de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po dag la slab par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar dag la yang de ltar slab par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa

88a1: shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po do ltar slob pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i
88a2: zla byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol daphyin pa la slob pa yin te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po// de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa
88a3: dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la slob ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po dag la slob ste/ de yang
88a4: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la slob ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bris 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
88a5: ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
88a6: sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshal gyis slob pa yin no/ / shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci zhig mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bre shin du rnam par
88a7: dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmigs so/ / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bir dag mi dmigs so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ brang po dang // khams dang / skye mched dang / nyin nga 'brel bar 'thung ba mi dmigs so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i//
88a8: byig sdug bsngal mi dmags so// shan du rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mi dmigs so// shinang rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi

88b1: dmigs so/ / shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos bum bcu ma bdun po dag mi dmigs so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar dag mi dmigs so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i
88b2: phyir rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so/ / shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub dang /
88b3: sangs rgyas kyi bar du mi dmigs so// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu chos thams cad kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa
88b4: med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
88b5: po chos gang dag la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la yang mi slob bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu chos 'di dag ni ji ltar byis pas
88b6: so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen pa de lta bur yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ / shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di dag ji lta bur mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu ji ltar med pa de ltar yod//
88b7: la/ de ltar yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir ma rig pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mchis pa ma lags pa la ma rig pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang /
88b8: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugs yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yod pa ma yin dang

89a1: stong pa nyid dang / dngos pa med pa'i ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ khams dang / skyem ched dang / rten cing 'bral bar 'byung ba nga / b.ram du phyin pa rnams yang pam yin/ nang mang pa nyid dang / dngas pa mad pa'ang ba nyid kyang /
89a2: nyid kyi bar gyi phyi'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwabargyad kyi bar dag yod pa ma yin na/ de la byis pa gang dag ma
89a3: rig pa dang / sred pa dag gisi mngon par zhen pa de dag gis yod pa ma yin pa la brtags te/ yod pa ma yin pa la mngon par zhen nas/ 'di lta ste/ rtag pa dang / chad pa'i mthar gnyis la chags pas na/ de dag ni mi shes mi mthong ba ste/ de dag gis chos
89a4: gang dag yod pa ma yin pa'i chos de dag yongs su brtags pas/ midi dang gzugs la mngon par zhen cing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar dag la yang mngon par zhen to// de dag de
89a5: ltar mngon par zhen pas na/ yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la rtog par byed pa'i phyir te/ de dag ni mi shes mi mthong ba yin no// ci zhig mi she la mthong zhe na/ gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo // tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
89a6: pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar dag mi shes mi mthong bas de'i phyir byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su
89a7: 'gro ba yin no/ / de dag na nges par 'byung ba ma yin te/ gang nas ngas par 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs kyi khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung
89a8: ba ma yin no/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// de dag ni ma dad pa yin te ci zhig la mdang ce na/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar ma dang pha nas/ byang chub ni byang chub kyis stong zhes bya ba'i bar dag

89b1: la ma dad pa yin no/ / de dag ni mi gnas pa yin te/ ci zhig la mi gnas she na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
89b2: gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas so// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la mi gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag la mi gnas pa yin te/ de'i phyir byis pa rnams shes bya'o// de dag ni mngon par zhan pa yin te/
89b3: ci zhig la mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no// mig la mngon par zhen pa yin no// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
89b4: yid la mngon par zhen pa yin no// gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin no// sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / chos rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no// phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no// 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /
89b5: gti mug rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no// lta bar gyur pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no// byang chub kyi bar dag la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de'i phyir de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan
89b6: 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bri de ltar slob pa'i
89b7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
89b8: chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thobs la mi mkhas

90a1: bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtags nas/ mngon par zhen par byed/ de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /
90a2: sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la btags nas mngon par zhen par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la brtags nas/ mngon par zhen par byed de/ shA ri'i bri rnam grangs des
90a3: nabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
90a4: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba lags mod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
90a5: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob
90a6: ba lags shing / ji ltar bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bri byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi go shes
90a7: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shA ri'i bri byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung
90a8: ngo / / de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ smin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mi dmigs

90b1: yang dag par rjes su mi mthong byang chub kyi bar dag mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi thong / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang me migs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
90b2: po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la/ de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa yin te/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dri nges par 'byung ngo // shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci zhig me dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung
90b3: b.lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ shA brirnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid med migs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'gyur ro// shes rabasde pha rol du phyin pa khri bzung stong ba las mtshan mi'i le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'am
90b4: latshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri ste/ ci sku ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brlabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dri nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ nam pa thams cad mkhyen
90b5: pa nyid theb par 'gyur ras zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de gad 'dra ba de la jis snyan par bgyi/ de bzhin du cu sku ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi ba ros du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i b.ros du pha rol du byed pa dang / tshul khrims kyis
90b6: rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i b.ros du byin pa la bathabs nas/ rnam pa thams pa dmakhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur dab/ rnam pa thams cad sa khyen pa nyid pob par 'gyur ngas zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de gang 'dri ba de la jig snyan par brtse/ byang chub kyi
90b7: mas pa kyi ba dang / da pa bams sa byed pa 'i pa la ma sa nas / nam sathangs dam che pa sa par byung bar zur ga nas thams das than pa par gyung bshe pa'i/ bco na pa da nga pa
90b8: na pas/ sacan gas gagasar pa/ bang na med yang bya ma de ra na mog pa nga na gas/ gag gag sa ma na

91a1: shes dang / / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ mig/
91a2: kyang gzhan zhig yi ni snyam 'am/ sku ma yang gzhan la/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ gzugs kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ sgra dang dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang
91a3: gnan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhig yini skam 'am/ sbrum yang gzhan la/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa
91a4: yang gzhan zhig/ yi ni snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan zhig ya ni snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan
91a5: zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ glu ma yang gzhan la/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang
91a6: ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus
91a7: te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni me lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji
91a8: skam dus mas/ zlum yang gzhanas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po dag kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de na ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka 'bul pa/ rab 'byor 'di di snyam du sems

91b1: lhur yang gzhan la steng panyid kyang gzhan zhigi sani ga ma'am/ sbru ma yang gzhan la mtshan ma med pa yang gzha zhig yini nam la/ sbrum yang gzhan la smon pa med pa yang gag zhig yin tam 'am/ ra 'byor byas gsol pa/ bcom na da ba de gas so// sam ldan
91b2: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcubargyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am// rab 'byor gyi
91b3: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni me lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yini snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom
91b4: ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs lags so/ bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'dra byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
91b5: pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags pa/ sku mnyid kyang rnam par shes pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mag kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid
91b6: kyang mig lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid lags so// bcom ldan 'das snu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ gzugs kyang
91b7: gzhanas lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs da kyang kyum lags pa/ sbrum nyid kyang gzugs lags so// bcom ldan 'das sum yang gzhan la lags/ swa dang dang dang reg bya dang / chos rnams cad gzhanas lags te/ bcom ldan 'ad chos rnams nyid kyang sgyum lags
91b8: la/ sna ma nyid kyang ches rnams lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mgi gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rgyum lags la/ sbrum nyid kyang mig ga rnam par shes pa lags so// bcom ldan

92a1: 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang
92a2: bla ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sku ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa lags
92a3: so/ bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lde'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ b+h+ra ma nyid
92a4: kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa la yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
92a5: rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ drug bsngal ba'am/ sdug brdal yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa nyid kyang glu ma lags la sbrum nyid kyang mag gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa lags so// bcom
92a6: ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ na ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug
92a7: brdal ba'am/ drug bsngal yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa nyid kyang snu ma lags la/ sku ma nyid kyang
92a8: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan

92b1: 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu tsa bdun lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyang sbrum
92b2: lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mtshan ma ma mchis pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags so// bcom
92b3: ldan 'das sku ma yang gzhan ma lags/ smon pa ma mchis pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das smon pa ma mchis pa nyid kyang glu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang smon pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs
92b4: pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
92b5: pa bza brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
92b6: nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/
92b7: rnam par byang ba yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba 'am 'gag pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
92b8: de ni ma mchis lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la slob par 'gyur
92b9: nyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur snyam 'am// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//

93a1: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po brgyad pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag
93a2: la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar mi dgi brdas tha snyad du gdags su yod dam// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di
93a3: ji snyam du sems ming gi brdas tha snyad du gdags pa tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag gi skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba dag dmigs su yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
93a4: ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems gang la ming dang mtshan ma med pa dang / brda med pa dang / gdags pa med pa dang / tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang /
93a5: ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / dag gi las med pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa
93a6: med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol
93a7: bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslabs na/ rnam pa
93a8: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tungs par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob

93b1: cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'tshal bas ni sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslab pa ltar/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung
93b2: po lnga po gang dag lags pa de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba lags pa'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tu nges par
93b3: 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so// de ci'i slad tu zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung po lnga po dag ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin
93b4: lags la/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de yang dmigs su ma mchis 'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams
93b5: cad mkhyen pa nyid tu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma'i byud lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang
93b6: bzhin yang shes sum mchis pa yang 'o/ / chom ldan 'das kyi pa/ 'asum pa/ rab byong 'di stes rgyas pas/ brag Nal bu'i phung po lnga po dag dang / mig yongs pa dang/ chu than pa dang / spyam ga pra dang/ khrig rgyag ba dang sprul pa la za dang /
93b7: gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so// de ci'i slang du zhen bcom
93b8: ldan 'das 'di ltar brag cha ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ mig yor yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ chu zla yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sum yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ smig rgyu yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/

94a1: sprul pa yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ gzugs brnyan yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar/
94a2: gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu lags te/ rnam par shes pa gang lags pa de ni dbang po drug lags shing / de dag ni phung po lnga po dag lags la/ de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyis dmigs su
94a3: ma mchis shing / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
94a4: sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur lags grang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa yang yin la/ thabs la
94a5: yang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu yang ma song na/ skrag cing dang ngal/ dadang par yang 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas bstan
94a6: pa'adi thos na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad
94a7: mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la mi rtag pa'i rnam par so sor rtog sa de yang mi dmigs so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi rtag
94a8: pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes

94b1: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /
94b2: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par sa sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sdug bsngal ba'i
94b3: rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong 'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste de yang ma dmigs so//
94b4: rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ rnam pa
94b5: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la mi rtag ces bya ba so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
94b6: par shes pa la mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems/
94b7: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
94b8: rnam par shes pa la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la bdag med ces bya bar sa

95a1: sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag med ces bya ba des sor tog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa sems dpa'
95a2: chen pornam pa thams cad maldan pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gas gzugs la zhigs bya ba sa sar rtog sa/ de yang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la zhigs bya ba ngas sor rtogs/ de yang
95a3: darigs so/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la stong zhes bya ba sa sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so//
95a4: tshar ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// gzugs la mtshan ma med ces bya ba res sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
95a5: dang / rnam par shes pa la mtshan ma med ces bya ba so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// gzugs la smon pa med ces bya bar so sor tog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sa
95a6: pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// gzugs la mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar so sor tog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mngon par 'du bya ba med
95a7: ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// gzugs la dben zhes bya ba so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dben zhes bya ba so sor rtogs/ de yang mi
95a8: dmigs so/ / rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar so sor rtog pa na 'di snyam du sems

95b1: te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar chos bstan par bya
95b2: sbede yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dpon
95b3: zhes bya bar chos bstan par byas/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// tshong ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / gong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma
95b4: med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba chos bstan par byis/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o snyam du sems so// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa'i
95b5: pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me skrag ming dang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba
95b6: dag gis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
95b7: shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dgags gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i
95b8: tshul gyis byed do/ / rnam par shes pa'i bar du sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul byed do// gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs shi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan mi med

96a1: ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed
96a2: rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes bzhi zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa sman pa med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa
96a3: mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa
96a4: ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ chos gang dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa
96a5: dang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par so sor rton
96a6: cing bzod la 'dod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ des ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang shing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
96a7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// gzugs
96a8: sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs zhi nas bya ba dang / gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba

96b1: dang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang /
96b2: zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan sa med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog cing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed de/ de'i rnam pa thams cad
96b3: mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams mi gtong zhing / brtson pa mi 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi
96b4: dang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa dang ldan pa dang / de las gzhan
96b5: pa mi dge ba'i chos gang byang chub kyi bar tu gcod par byed pa dag gi skabs mi 'byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
96b6: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad pa ni mi sgeg mi dang shing ngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di ltar so sor rtog/ ga
96b7: kyi stong ba nyid kyis gzugs stong ba ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'dra byed rnams dang / rnas par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin minas
96b8: pa shes pa nyid pa dong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi stong pa nyid kyis sog stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig nyid pang stong pa nyid do// song pa nyid pa mig go na pa dang / snadang sde dang / lus dang yid kyi stong pa nyid kyig

97a1: yid stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra dang dri dang / ro dang /
97a2: reg bya dang / chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos rnams stong pa ma yin gyi chos rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos rnams so// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes
97a3: pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis
97a4: yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stod pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus
97a5: te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid
97a6: kyi'adus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher rab stong pa
97a7: ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshe rab dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba
97a8: dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshe rab dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsherab dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bstong pa ma yin gyi/ yid

97b1: 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag
97b2: rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang lam gyi stong pa nyid kyis lam
97b3: stong pa ma yin gyi lam nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang lam mo// stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar stong pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
97b4: stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la
97b5: mkhas pa yin te/ thabs de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dadang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag gis yongs su zin na//
97b6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
97b7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag ni gang dag de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
97b8: kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams

98a1: cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
98a2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ston/ bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par
98a3: 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de
98a4: bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ston/ bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba
98a5: med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor
98a6: de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar ston/ sdug
98a7: bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / sman pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
98a8: ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lce dang / lus dang yid mi rtag ces bya bar ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang

98b1: bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
98b2: de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
98b3: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba
98b4: dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
98b5: sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang reg bya dang / chos mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / steng zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon
98b6: pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis son cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi
98b7: sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la
98b8: mig go rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / ni zhes bya ba dang / sto shes bya ba dang / mtshan ma

99a1: med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos ston// de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma btogs
99a2: par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du rna pa'i rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / de bzhin du sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid kyi rnam
99a3: par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar chos sngon sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba
99a4: dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
99a5: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
99a6: ni gang dag de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi
99a7: bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa
99a8: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi

99b1: rtag ces bya bar chos ston cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom du gzhug pa'i phyir chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / byang chub sgom du gzhug pa'i phyir chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de
99b2: dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams te/ de dag gis yongs su zin
99b3: pa ni bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dang bar mi 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i
99b4: sug par mchis shing / dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyis yongs su spangs nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste/ da dang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ba lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
99b5: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / de
99b6: bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du byin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa des kyang rlom
99b7: sems su byed pa dang / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas/ gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
