99b8: byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes

100a1: pa dang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi stong bzhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya ba yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa dngos po padapa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du 'di
100a2: la byed cing / nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa de yang dmigs/ byi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlob sams su byed pa dang / yig dang sto
100a3: pa'is bya bar yid la byed mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
100a4: rlom sems su byed pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid byi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yi dngos po ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid
100a5: la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la yang bya'o// de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang /
100a6: sA dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te dag pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyi 'dus
100a7: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/
100a8: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ ma rig pa dang / rga shi'i bar du nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong

100b1: pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal
100b2: spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rloms pas su byed
100b3: pa dang / de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
100b4: dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar dag sgom zhing / de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub
100b5: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste/ dngang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
100b6: 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis te/ sdig pa'i grogs po des yongs su zin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste dngang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ba
100b7: lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni gang 'di skad du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin
100b8: gyis 'di la bslab par mi bya'o/ / 'di dag ni snyan dngags mkhan gyi rang bzo yin pas 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o// gzung bar mi bya'o// kun chub par mi bya'o// bcang bar mi bya'o// klag par mi bya'o// bsgom par mi bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o//

101a1: gzhan dag la'ang bstan par mi bya'o zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar byed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol
101a2: tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig
101a3: pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung tu 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan
101a4: kyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i ro phyin pa pa sgos ngas khyod la tsa
101a5: zhig bya zhes zer zhing 'bral bar byed do zhes de la bdud kyi las rnams mi ston cing bdud kyi nyes pa dag mi brjod pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor/
101a6: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad tu bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs
101a7: kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung du bstan pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dag ston par byed/ rab tu ston par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed/ gsal bar byed/ yang dag par
101a8: rab tu ston par byed cing / bdud kyi las 'di lta bu de dag skyed par 'gyur ro zhes de la bdud kyi las rnams mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o//

101b1: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni
101b2: byang chub kyi sems cung zad kyang med do/ / khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa yang ma yin no// khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so zhes zer ro zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag
101b3: de la mi brjod mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems
101b4: dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu mig ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // gzugs ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // skra dang dri dang ro dang / reg bya dang / chos
101b5: rnams ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / / mig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag
101b6: dang bdag gis stong ngo / / mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo //
101b7: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
101b8: rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

102a1: dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
102a2: dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar ni bdag dang bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
102a3: par sangs rgyas pas ci zhig bya zhes zer ro zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud
102a4: sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyis
102a5: stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ nyan thos kyang med do// de bzhin duphyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la
102a6: sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ nyan thos kyang med do zhes zer ro zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab
102a7: 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can nyan thos kyi cha byad du bskur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag zlog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la
102a8: byed bdag la 'doms te/ rjes su ston par byed do nas bdu kyilas des bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang dud sdig can mkhan po dang /

102b1: slob dpon gyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang 'bral bar byed la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang bral bar byed cing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/
102b2: rnams la sbyor bar byed/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag la yang sbyor bar byed stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la yang sbyor bar byed cing / 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos 'di dag bsgoms la/
102b3: nyan thos kyis mngon sum du gyis shig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis cig zhig bya zhes zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi brjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por
102b4: rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can pha dang ma'i cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu gang gi don du bskal pa tshad med grangs med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing lag pa gcad pa
102b5: dang / rkang pa gcad pa dang / mgo gcad pa dpag tu med pa dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byar yod pa
102b6: d e la brtson par gyis shig gang la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i
102b7: grogs por rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha byad du bsnur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drud du 'ongs nas/ mig me rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston/ de bzhin du mig sdug bsngal
102b8: zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhe zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba dang sna dang mye dang lus dang /

103a1: yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i
103a2: tshul gyis ston pa dang / de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med
103a3: ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba/
103a4: dadang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug
103a5: bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi nas bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa'i bdud kyi las des
103a6: bde dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa da na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya ste/ rig nas kyang yongs su srung bar bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ sbra ma lta bu'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o//
103a7: de nas so ma ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skar ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bkri ba'i gni don gang lags de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
103a8: rab 'byor la 'dig sa paka'abul to/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi don nagani med pa'i don to// de ci'i phyir nan/ rab 'byor byang chu kyang skyeb med sems dpa' yang skyeb sa dang/ rab 'byor byang chub dang / sems dpa'al skye ba dang yod pa

103b1: nyid med cing mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor byang chub la yang gzhi med/ sems dpa' yadaga'i med de/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bya'i rjes med cing mi dmigs
103b2: so/ / ba 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gzhi don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta snyed dper na/ rmi la ma la gni med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi 'don kyang med cing mi dmigs so//
103b3: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ snu ma la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// mig r+b+ha dang / chu zla dang / brag cha dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
103b4: dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin nyid la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ ma
103b5: nor ba de bzhin nyid la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gin med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin
103b6: du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byord
103b7: bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la mig gi gni med cing mi dmigs so//
103b8: ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi gni med cing mi dmigs so// gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg bya dang / chos kyi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin

104a1: pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi rnam par shes pa la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par
104a2: shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes bkyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
104a3: byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
104a4: chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med/
104a5: cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu/
104a6: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang //
104a7: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i
104a8: don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gzugs kyi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

104b1: chen ba shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi 'don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la tshor ba dang / 'dra
104b2: shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so//
104b3: 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mig gi gzhi med do// rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang yid kyi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
104b4: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la nang stong pa nyid kyi gzhi med do// dngos po
104b5: med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi bzhi med do/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin
104b6: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi gzhi med do/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar dag gi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
104b7: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams la 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gzhi med do// 'dus byas kyi khams la yang 'dus ma/
104b8: byas kyi khams kyi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skye ba med pa la gzhi med do//

105a1: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du ba
105a2: bamed pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
105a3: la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis pa la gang gi gzhi ma mchis pa lags kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i bar la/
105a4: gang gi gni ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor skye ba med pa la gzugs kyi gzhi med do// skye ba med pa la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor//
105a5: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par bya ba med pa'i bar la gzugs kyi gzhi med do// kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byas med pa'i bar la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi
105a6: med do/ / de bzhin du skye ba med pa la khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams kyi gzhi med do// kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la khams dang skye mched rnams kyi gzhi med do// skye ba med pa la byang chub kyi phyogs// /
105a7: kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar dag gi gzhi med do// kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa
105a8: brgyad kyi bar dag gi gzhi med do/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs la skye/

105b1: pa med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
105b2: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa
105b3: dang 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar gyi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
105b4: gzhi'i don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
105b5: sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
105b6: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ / de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do// rab
105b7: 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan
105b8: ma'i gzhi med do/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul

106a1: gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar dag shin tu rnam par dag
106a2: pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bdag med pa'i phyir/ bdag
106a3: shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do/ / shes pa po dang mthong ba pa med pa'i phyir/ shes yo dang / mthong ba po'i bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
106a4: phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba la mun pa'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
106a5: spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sreg pa'i bskal pa la 'du byed thams cad kyi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
106a6: spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la 'tshal ba'i tshul khrims kyi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin
106a7: du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rnam par g.yeng ba'i gzhi med do// de bzhin
106a8: gshegs pa'i shes rab la 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi gzhi med do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba la rnam par ma grol ba'i gzhi med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthod

106b1: pa ma yin pa'i gzhi med do/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od
106b2: la mun pa'i gzhi med do/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gza' dang skar ma dang nor
106b3: bu rin po che dang / glog gi 'od la gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i
106b4: ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / 'thab bral gyi lha rnams dang dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi
106b5: lha rnams kyi 'od la gzhi med do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar gyi 'od la gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// de ci'i phyir
106b6: zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/
106b7: thogs pa med pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad
106b8: khong du chud par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi ma mchis pa nyid la ni rdo ltar bslab par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa'

107a1: sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar khong du chud par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung bstan du yod pa dang / lung du ma bstan pa
107a2: dang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dag go// rab
107a3: 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de dag gi med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ba yang de dag yin no// /
107a4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa// bam po dgu pa/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams shes
107a5: bya ba ni bar 'dzin pa dang / mar 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i
107a6: bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / zhal ta byed pa dang ldan pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i
107a7: 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus gang gi 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam
107a8: gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 'jig rten pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su

107b1: dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs dbyung bar brngub pa rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa dang / skyob rjes su dran pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams
107b2: shes bya'o/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba ni srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang /
107b3: 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyil ba dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang / tho ba dang khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang /
107b4: phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal te rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba rnams shes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
107b5: lus kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// ngag gi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// yid kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// dbang po lnga ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// skye mched drug ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/
107b6: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// rnam par smin pa ni lung du ma bstan pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams shes
107b7: bya'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba ni phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bcwa brgyad
107b8: dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par 'jig rten pa'i

108a1: chos gang ji snyed pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jig
108a2: rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
108a3: brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po
108a4: dang / rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me tog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / rnam
108a5: par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nad gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di na rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// sdug pa nyid du mos pa 'di na rnam
108a6: par thar pa gsum pa'o/ / de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas na pa
108a7: mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ / de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas
108a8: skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ dri yang med do gas nag/ mi nga med pa'i bye brjed bsdus te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// de rnam

108b1: pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i sgra ma red las yang dag par 'das 'du shes med 'du shes med med skye ma ched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di na rnang par thar pa bdun pa'o/ / de rnam pa thams cad du 'dra shes med 'du shes med pa'i skye ma ded las yang
108b2: dag par 'das nas 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig
108b3: pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can zas pa gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/ sems
108b4: kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing / dran pa dang shes
108b5: bzhin can yin te bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de bde ba yang spangs/ snga nas
108b6: sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub pas/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du
108b7: gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs
108b8: te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes

109a1: mtha' yas ste mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci'ang med do snyam nas/ ci 'ang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes
109a2: med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mchod las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tsho rab 'gog pa bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'ju/
109a3: pa dgu'o// nga stong pa nyid das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad rnams te/ de dag ni
109a4: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o/ / de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bco brgyad dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang /
109a5: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la zag pa med pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
109a6: bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ba
109a7: brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / de ma yin pa gzhan gang dag 'dus byas sug khro
109a8: pa'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar dag kyang yin te/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams shes bya'o// de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gdazhe na/ chos gang dag

109b1: la skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / gzhan du 'gyur bar mi snang ba dag ste/ 'dod chags zad pa dang / zhe sdang zad pa dang / gti mug zad pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang //
109b2: chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes bya'o// dal thun mang gi chos rnams gang zhe na/ bsam gtan pa'i dang / tshad med pa pa'i dang /
109b3: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga ste/ de dag ni thun mong gi chos rnams shes bya'o// de la thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa ba ngan dang / stobs
109b4: bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la bar
109b5: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos thams cad la rtog pa med pa dang / dpyod pa med pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la chags pa med pa dang / yod pa ma yin par
109b6: bslab par bya'o/ / chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul du khong du chud par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nas bgyib
109b7: ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems kyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
109b8: sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi phul bgyid par 'gyur ba'i sems can gyi tshogs chen po ni gang lags/ sems can gyi ris pal ba che ni gang

110a1: lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi tshogs chen po zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom
110a2: pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag go/ rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris pa la/
110a3: po che zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de'i phul byed par 'gyur ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul
110a4: du 'gyur bar bya'o/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/
110a5: 'khor ba dpag tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go cha bgo bar bya'o// bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bar bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o// bdag gis
110a6: sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang / sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med pas/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa
110a7: med pa bdag gis rtogs par bya'o/ / bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma 'dres pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o// bdag gis thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i chos rtogs pa yongs su grub pa la bslab par bya'o//
110a8: chos rnams tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa bdag gis rtogs par bya'o// bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa'i bar dag bsgrub pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bslab par bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

110b1: chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris pal po che'i phul byed par 'gyur te/ de yang mi de rigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// ba
110b2: 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems 'di ltar bskyed de/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gyi tsher rab myong bar
110b3: gyur pa de dag gi don du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gong tu sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can de dag phung po'i lhag pa med pa'i mya
110b4: n gan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ma gyur gyi bar du sems can gcig gi don du yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes thabs
110b5: de lta bus sems can de dag phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mgur gyi bar du sems can thams cad kyi ched du bdag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de nyams su myong bar bya'o/ / phyis
110b6: gang dbangag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum du byang chub kyi tshogs bsags la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// rab
110b7: 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par 'gyur ro//
110b8: 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems gang gis sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba'i sems rlabs po che rtag par rgyun du bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems

111a1: rlabs pa che ni gang sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi bskyed/ gti mug gi sems mi bskyed/ rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems mi bskyed nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
111a2: sems mi bskyed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che yin te/ des sems can thams cad kyi bral du phyin par byed cing / des rlom sems su'ang mi byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byung
111a3: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi skal ba'i sems sa bya'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi smras pa ni 'di yin te/ gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rlo
111a4: sems su mi byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sprul ba'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bdabang bya ba'i sems bskyed/
111a5: par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i sems ni 'di yin te/ gang sams can thams cad slob cing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la/ des rlom sems su'ang mi byed pa ste/ rab
111a6: 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i sems so/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin par byed par
111a7: 'gyur te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par rgyun du chos 'dod par bya'o// chos la dga' bar bya'o// chos la kun du dga' bar bya'o// chos la kun du dga' ba'i
111a8: rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o/ / de la chos gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste/ de ni chos shes bya'o// de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos la 'dod cing mos pa ste/ de ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o// de la chos la dga' bag

111b1: zhe na/ gang chos la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/ de ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o// de la tshes la kun du dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos la yon tan dang / phan yon du lta ba ste/ de ni chos la kun du dga' ba zhes bya'o// de la tshes la kun tu dka'
111b2: ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la sgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ de ni chos la kun du dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar
111b3: spyod pas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris pal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
111b4: lo spyod pas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas nas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor
111b5: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la gnas/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
111b6: 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar dag la gnas nas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ras phal po che'iphul du phyin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
111b7: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas ste/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems
111b8: can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du byin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos de dag la gnas te/ sems can gyi tshogs

112a1: chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par byed par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ khrel yod pa'i le'u zhes
112a2: bya ste/ bcu gcig pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lags so//
112a3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la khyod spobs par bgyis shig/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba spang ba'i slad du sems can
112a4: rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin du sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / byed tu 'jug pa po dang / slong ba po dang / kun nas slong ba po
112a5: dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed du 'jug pa po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba por lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / yod par lta ba dang / med par lta ba dang / phung por lta ba dang / khams su lta ba dang / skye mched tu lta
112a6: ba dang / bden par lta ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar lta ba dang / pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs par lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta ba dang / sems
112a7: can yongs su smin par bgyi bar lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar lta ba dang / yongs su
112a8: mya ngan las 'das par lta ba spang ba'i slad du/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can rnams la chos ston te/ don des ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di/

112b1: skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i/
112b2: bar dulta bar 'gyur ba yin/ shA ri'i bus smras pa tshe dang ldan par ba 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gzugs la dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do//
112b3: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
112b4: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la
112b5: mkhas pas/ lta ba de dag spang ba'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/
112b6: ba la bdag kyang spobs pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod spobs par gyis shig/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
112b7: thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems gang lags pa'i sems de la yang chags pa ma mchis pas don des ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni zag pa
112b8: ma mchis shing khongs su gtogs pa ma lags pa lags te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su gtogs pa ma lags pa'i sems de la yang chags pa ma mchis pas de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

113a1: zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi'o/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
113a2: pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems de gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed byin cad chos gang la yang skyo ba'am/
113a3: 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'grib pa dang 'phel ba dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang /
113a4: 'grib pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de la nyan thos kyi sems med rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems med//
113a5: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems
113a6: so/ / shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa/ khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa gang yin pa'i sems de la yang chags pa med ces smras na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
113a7: gzugs kyang chags pa med pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bre de de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa med do//
113a8: tshe rab dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs dang / mi 'dzegs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres

113b1: pa rnams kyi bar du yang chags pa med do/ / shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems gang yin pa de yang zag pa med cing / khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no zhes smras na/ tshe dang ldan
113b2: pa rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs
113b3: kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong panyid kyi byor/
113b4: zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras
113b5: pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ / shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
113b6: ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji skad smra ba/ de de bzhin te/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi
113b7: sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin gyis
113b8: stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no// gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/

114a1: zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi che ba sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ban bya
114a2: kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyi gang 'di skad du sems med pa'i phyir/ sems de la yang chags pa med ces smras na//
114a3: dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med dam/ tshor ba med pa yang tshor ba la chags pa med dam 'du shes med pa yang 'du shes la chags pa med dam/ 'du byed rnams med pa yang 'du byed rnams la chags pa med dam/
114a4: rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams med pa yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
114a5: chos rnams la chags pa med dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ gzugs
114a6: med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do/ / tshe rab dang / 'du shes dang / 'du bye rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do// khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams
114a7: ngang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do// shA ri'i bu byang chub
114a8: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / ngar sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang chos thams cad

114b1: bi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med/ mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba med de/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ lta ba slang bi rale'u zhes
114b2: bya ste/ bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa byams mi bra gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bkye ba la bdag kyang spobs lags pa
114b3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod spobs par gyis shig/ gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de ni go cha chen po bgos pa lags/ sems can chen po de na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa lags/ sems
114b4: can de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i ba gang po la 'di skad ces smras so//
114b5: dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyi tshe ba'i sems can rnams kyi ched du byang
114b6: chub kyi phyir spyod pa ma yin/ srin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sbyin pa sbyin pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
114b7: phyin pa la gnas te/ tshul khrims srung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims srung ngo // nyi tshe'i sems rnams kyi ched du/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ bzod pa sgom pa ma
114b8: yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bzod pa sgom par byed do// nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad

115a1: kyi ched du brtson 'grub kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ / nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched
115a2: du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bsam gtan rnams bskyed do/ / nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ shes rab bsgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha/
115a3: rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab sgom par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can 'di
115a4: snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o zhes 'am/ sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub la dgod par bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub la dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpag pas go cha mi gyon gyi/ byang chub sem
115a5: dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi ched du go cha gyon no/ / de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o//
115a6: de bzhin du bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems
115a7: can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o snyam mo/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag
115a8: gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba

115b1: de ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha
115b2: rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
115b3: spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos de dag la bzod
115b4: pa dang / mos pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
115b5: chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis brtson 'grus rtsom pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha
115b6: rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems rtsa gcig tu byed de/ nyan thos dang rang
115b7: sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
115b8: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin zhing / de gcig pu la dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / de sbyin pa po yang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa yang mi dmigs len pa po

116a1: yang mi dmigs pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
116a2: po gang gi tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la mtshan mar mi 'dzin cor mi dmigs pa ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
116a3: la de ltar spyod pa go cha chen po bgos par rig par bya ba yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pal
116a4: y id la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
116a5: pa'o tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang 'dod pa med na so so'i skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'
116a6: sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad
116a7: mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan
116a8: y ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis brtson 'grus mi nyams mi gong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

116b1: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
116b2: ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed cing / sems bskyed pa de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
116b3: chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims
116b4: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshul khrims des rlom sems su yang mi byed la mi
116b5: dmigs pa de ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha
116b6: rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
116b7: spyod pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa/
116b8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin

117a1: pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
117a2: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / sems can thams
117a3: cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sbyor te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i tharo
117a4: tu byin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byab/
117a5: dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su ba/
117a6: ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
117a7: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
117a8: bdag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par/

117b1: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
117b2: chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis smin basbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can
117b3: thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i snyan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi
117b4: rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsamagatan
117b5: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing chos thams cad la snrums byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog ste/ de yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi rnam pa tham
117b6: cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
117b7: chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs
117b8: rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis 'khor gsum yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong

118a1: byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
118a2: spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
118a3: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing / de pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang chos thams cad la sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang mig yor dang / brag cha dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa lta bu'i 'du shes nye bar
118a4: gnas pa yin te/ de nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldani pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang bya bang du byas
118a5: de ka na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems
118a6: dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan rnams la yang
118a7: snyoms par 'jug la/ bsam gtan rnams kyi re mya dbang yang mi byed cing / de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs te/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi ste/ tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la yang snyoms par 'jug la ro myang bar/
118a8: yang mi byed cing/ de ga gis kyang mi 'phrogs la/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye ste/ tshe dang ldan pa gA ri'i bri de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen pa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan

118b1: pa shA ri'i bri ka/ na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben par mthong nas nang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / glen pa med
118b2: par mthong nas gnas kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon sum du mi byed de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i go cha chen po yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de
118b3: ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go ra chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos pa la phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
118b4: ldan 'das rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gage mo zhig ces bya ba zhigan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go rje chen po bgos pa zhig sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
118b5: par byed ces ched tu brjod pa ched tu rjod cing bsngags pa yang gsung la ming yang yongs su sgrogs shing / byang chub sems dpa' de'i sgra rjod pa yang mdzad la/ dbyangs rjes su sgrogs pa yang mdzad do// shA ri'i bus spab
118b6: tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis ni/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin
118b7: gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing / de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa
118b8: rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang /

119a1: byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ kho ni med pa/ 'gran bla med pa/ gnod pa med pa shin du bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mams
119a2: gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa rgya chen po gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin
119a3: du bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye
119a4: mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te/ gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams te/ byang chub sems
119a5: dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma rnams kyis bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ba na/ dge ba'i
119a6: rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
119a7: pa dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la yang gong ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / tshad med/
119a8: pa bzhi dang / gzug sa med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po dag la snyoms par 'jug ste/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis gnas shing / de bsam

119b1: gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug la ldang ba na/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma rnams yid la byed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /
119b2: gzhan dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub
119b3: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
