199b4: chen po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / mi dmigs lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
199b5: ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de ni ming tsam du bas lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/ bdag bdag ces bgyi yang bdag mngon
199b6: par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi yang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so// zhes smra// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
199b7: ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ / bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos rnams dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/ gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags/ gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang mngon
199b8: par grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags so// gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags so zhes smra/ tshe dang

200a1: ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam zhes smra// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor cig
200a2: phyir 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par ma grub pa las gud na yang gang byang chub kyi slad du spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su ma mchis pa lags so zhes smra// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad
200a3: bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum/ mi 'gong zhing yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur la/ mi skrag mi dang zhing / dngang par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
200a4: dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la smod pa la gas par rig par bgyi'o zhes smra/ / rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to//
200a5: tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can stong pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
200a6: sems can dngos po med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to// gzugs stong pa dang / gzugs dben pa dang /
200a7: gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to// rnam
200a8: par shes pa stong pa dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems

200b1: dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa stong pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dben pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to// de bzhin
200b2: du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
200b3: mthar khas mi len to/ / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dben pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to// de ci'i
200b4: phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams kyang mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhing / sngon gyi mtha' dang /
200b5: phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams kyang gzhan ma yin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus gang
200b6: yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med pa'i phyir ro/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len
200b7: to/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu med pa yang gzhan/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ dben pa yang gzhan/ ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yang gzhan/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du
200b8: phyin pa yang gzhan/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yang gzhan/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang gzhan/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yang gzhan/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang gzhan zhing / sngon gyi tha'

201a1: dang khyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na med pa gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dben pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / pha rol du phyin
201a2: pa drug gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des
201a3: na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to// dngos po med
201a4: pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid med pa dang / nang stong pa nyid stong pa dang / nang stong pa nyid
201a5: dben pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
201a6: stong pa nyid dben pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tod med pa la sngon gyi batha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// nang stong pa nyid med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan la/ dngos
201a7: po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang / stong pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan zhing / byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan la/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i yig 'a dang dbas rnams kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na/ dang
201a8: stong pa nyid med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa

201b1: dang sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi
201b2: ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas
201b3: len to/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dben pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / kyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus
201b4: rnams su khas mi len to/ / de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams med pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang
201b5: dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to// de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
201b6: stong pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dben pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
201b7: tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa yang gzhan
201b8: ma yin/ dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du yang gzhan ma yin zhing / sngon gyi mtha' dang /

202a1: phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams kyang bzhan pa yin pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
202a2: 'dres pa rnams kyi bar dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha'
202a3: dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin thams cad med pa dang / gzungs kyi sgra thams cad med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings med pa dang / de bzhin nyid med pa dang / yang dag
202a4: pa'i mtha' med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / bye ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to// de ci'i phyir
202a5: zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu med pa yang gzhan/
202a6: stong pa yang gzhan/ dben pa yang gzhan/ de bo nyid med pa yang gzhan/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yang gzhan zhing / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/
202a7: dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu da ltar na med pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i bar gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' bar dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus
202a8: rnams gang yin pa de dag ni thams cad kyi thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'

202b1: dang / dbus rabs thukhas mi len to// ci dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang nyan thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sebs dpa' sngon gyi tha' dang / bye ba'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su 'as bi len ka/ na thos stong pa dang / da thos dben pa dang / 'thos po nyid pa 'i byi ba
202b2: sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to// rang sangs rgyas med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad babyen pa nyid med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad 'khyen pa nyid stong pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
202b3: nyid dben pa dang / rnam pa thabs cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa la
202b4: sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyang gzhan la sngon gyi mtha' dang / byi ba'i mtha' dang / dbus rnabs
202b5: kyang gzhan ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas de dag ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rna pa
202b6: grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / byi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khyod gang 'di ska da du/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ gzugs bu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bu med par rig par bya/ ror ba dang /
202b7: 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bu med par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni nam mkha' dang panyam pa yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni nam
202b8: ma'athanyas pa med / / ci byi shen/ nga blan pa shA bu 'dis te pa dadamapa'a' 'ani ba 'ang / dngas dang / metha' med pags kyang / rnam pa' she pa shad 'gas pa// pang ldan pa shA phre shing dgazugs tong pa nyi

203a1: pa'i phyir gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la ni mtha' 'am/ dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du bor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
203a2: rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir tshor dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la ni mtha' 'am/ dbus dmigs su med
203a3: pa'i phyir ro/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs mu med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya'o//
203a4: tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang
203a5: dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma sa dreb pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mtha' yas mu med pa'i phyir nam mkha' la mtha' 'am/ dbus mi dmigs kyang nam mkha' zhes tha snyad 'dogs
203a6: so/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mtha' 'am/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am/ dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs
203a7: des na/ sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ tshor
203a8: ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed

203b1: rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa sa stong // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid la ni gzugs med cing mi dmigs/ stong pa nyid la ni byang chub sems dpa' med cing mi dmigs la/ de bzhin du stong pa nyid lan tshor ba dang / 'du shes
203b2: dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mad cing mi dmigs/ stong pa nyid la ni byang chub sems dpa' med cing pa dmigs pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bri nam grangs des na/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin
203b3: no/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas stong ngo // de bzhin du tshul
203b4: khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid la ni/ shes rab kyi
203b5: pha rol du phyin pa med cing / stong pa nyid la ni byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa
203b6: nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo / / yang dag pa'i spong pa rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs
203b7: rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo / / chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ngo // de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong ngo // yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mthas stong ngo // bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni bsam gyis mi khyab
203b8: pa'i dbyings kyis stong ngo / / ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin gyis stong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ngo // thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rnam pa thams cad mabyed

204a1: pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo / / nyan thos kyis theg pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pas stong ngo // rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni rang sang brgyas kyi theg pas stong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pasastong ngo // nyan thos ni
204a2: nyan thos kyis stong ngo / / rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas kyis stong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas stong ste// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa nyid la ni gzugs med cing mi
204a3: dmigs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa nyid la ni/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cir mi dmigs pa yin no//
204a4: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rna bas dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis
204a5: thams cad kyis thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / mi dmigs lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams par bgyi zhing
204a6: rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs la dmigs su med de// gzugs ni tshor ba la dmigs su med do// tshor ba ni tshor ba la dmigs su med do// tshor ba ni gzugs la dmigs su med do// gzugs
204a7: dang / tshor ba dag ni 'du shes la dmigs su med do// 'du shes ni 'du shes la dmigs su med do// 'du shes ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dag la dmigs su med do// 'du byed rnams ni 'du shes la med ci nga mi dmigs so// 'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnam la med
204a8: cing mi dmigs so/ / 'du shes ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so// 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so// gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes ni 'du byed

204b1: rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so// gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang /
204b2: 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnamal med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu meg ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so// mig ni na pa la med cing mi dmigs so// rna ba ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so// rab nin pal med cing mi dmigs pa/ rna bani sAl
204b3: lamed cing me dmigs sa/ / ni snga la med cing mi dmigs sa// dzA ni mig dang ldanan pal ma cing mi dmigs so// rbA ni lcel med cing mi dmigs so// gyon ltel me shing mi dmigs so// ljon mig dang na ba dang / sA dag la sang cing sa dmigs sa//
204b4: lus la med cid mi dmigasas// lum ni lus la med cing mi dmigs sa// lus ni mig dang / na ba dang / sna dang / khrirnams la med par med migasas// mus ni mid la med cing mi dmigs sa// yid ni yid 'a ma ring med migasas// yi mig ba nga /
204b5: sna dang / lce dang / lus rnams la med cing mi dmigs so// gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so// gzugs ni sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so// sgra ni sgra la med cing mi dmigs so// sgra ni gzhan dag la yang mang
204b6: cing mi dmigs so/ / de bzhin du dri ni dri dang / gzhan dag la yang med cing mi dmigs so// ro ni ro dang gzhan dag la yang med cing mi dmigs so// reg bya ni reg bya dang gzhan dag la yang med cing mi gamigs so// chos ni chos rnams dang gzhan dag la yang med
204b7: cing mi dmigs so/ / mig gi rnam par shes pa ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so// gzhan dag kyang de sa med cing mi dmigs so// de dag la yang de med cing mi dmigs so// na ba'i rnam pa shes pa dang / rtswa'i rnam par shes pa pa lce das
204b8: pa shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni de bzhin te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so// gzhan dag kyang de la med cing mi dmigs so// de yang gzhan dag la med cing mi dmigs sa

205a1: mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ / de ni gzhan das yang med cing mi dmigs so// de la gzhan dag kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /
205a2: lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang de bzhin te// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yang reg pa gzhan dag med cing mi dmigs so//
205a3: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so// de la yang gzhan dag dang gzhan dag la yang gzhan dag med cing mi dmigs so// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg
205a4: pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ / de la yang gzhan dag dang // gzhan dag la yang gzhan dag med cing mi dmigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs
205a5: so/ / de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
205a6: bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad po dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ so so yang dag
205a7: par rig pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so// chos thams cad ni chos thams cad la med cing mi dmigs so// chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la med cing mi
205a8: dmigs so/ / nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la med cing mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs

205b1: so/ dngos po med pa'i rabo nyid stong pa nyid ninang stong pa nyid kyi bar la med cing me dmigs so// ting nge 'dzin ni ti ngange 'dzin la med cing mi dmigs so// ting nge 'dzin na gzungs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so// gzungs ni gzungs sa med cing mi dmigs so//
205b2: gzungs ni ting nge 'dzin la med cing mi dmigs so// sa so'i skye ba'i sa ni so so skye bo'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so// rigs kyis dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa can gyis dang /
205b3: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so// de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa la med cing mi dmigs so//
205b4: lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas nyid la med cing mi dmigs so// byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la med cing mi dmigs so//
205b5: byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la med cing mi dmigaso shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa yang shes ba kyi pha rol du phyin pal med yi dmigs so// dmas pa dang / rjes su bstan pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol duphyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so// gdams pa dang / rjes
205b6: su bstan pa ni/ gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so// byang chub sems dpa' ni gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i ba de ltar na chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs pas/ byang chub
205b7: sems dpa' yang med cing mi dmigs te bstan du med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri 'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de ni ming tsam du bas lags so zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa/
205b8: shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi ming de ni phyogs bcu gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du

206a1: yang mi 'gro'o/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong/ gang du yang mi 'gro'o// 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes shes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams shes bya ba dang / rnam
206a2: par shes pa zhes bya ba de dag ni glo brar du mang du btags pa yin no/ / ming gang yin pa de yang gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming ni ming gango ba
206a3: nyid kyis stong la/ stong pa gang yin pa de ni ming ma yin pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba ni ming tsam ste/ ming la yang
206a4: sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa med la/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la yang ming med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
206a5: zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/ / de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba na ming
206a6: tsam ste/ ming la yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang ming med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga med cing mi dmigs pa'i
206a7: phyir te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags pa yin pas/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba dang / dngos po med//
206a8: med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar de ni ming tsam ste/ nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang ming med la/ ming la yang nang stong pa nyid med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las gud na yang mid med la/ ming la yang dngos po med

206b1: pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med po'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/
206b2: tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnams grangs des na 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
206b3: rnams las gud na yang ming med la/ ming la yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar/ ming gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// de
206b4: bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par
206b5: rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad ces bya ba de dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na yang ming med la/ med la yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa
206b6: shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes bya ba dang / rnam pa thams
206b7: cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na yang ming med la/ ming la yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin/
206b8: pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa de gicig yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyin/ bdag bdag ces bgyib

207a1: yang bdag mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so zhes sgra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bdag gtan med cing mi dmigs na// de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can dang / srog dang /
207a2: skye ba po dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba ltag la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs
207a3: gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs rnyedade mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gtan
207a4: med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs gtan med cing
207a5: mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gi rnam par shes pa
207a6: gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
207a7: mig gi 'dus te reg pa gtar med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba ltag la yod/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod
207a8: tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshe ba gtan med cing mi dmigs

207b1: mde dag ngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du
207b2: byiphyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du byin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rang stong pa nyid
207b3: gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar
207b4: gzhag pa rnams gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /
207b5: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba la
207b6: ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ nyan thos gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta/
207b7: ga la yod/ rang sangs rgyas gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ byang chub sems dpa' gtan mo cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
207b8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de/ tshe dang ldan shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ bdag bdag ces bya ba yang bdag mngon par grub pa ni gtan med pa yin no//

208a1: tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang khyod 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir 'di ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lag na zhes sla zhes zer ba ni// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
208a2: bu 'di ltar 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/ / shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang gi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo
208a3: nyid med do/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / le dang / lus
208a4: dang / yid kyi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// tshe dang ldan pa shwa ri'i bu de bzhin du/ gzugs dang / skra dang / dri dang / ro dang reg bya dang / chos rnams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi
208a5: rnam par shes pa dang / / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang las dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i
208a6: 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin
208a7: padang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba ngo bo nyid med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no// tshe dang ldan pa
208a8: ri'i bu gzhan yang chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin pa de gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa

208b1: cho ldan pa shA 'i bag gas ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA 'i'i bri tshor pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang thal bas ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan
208b2: pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar mi rtag pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'o/ / de bzhin du chos thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// de ci'i
208b3: phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar smon pa med pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du chos thams cad ni dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten las
208b4: 'das pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'dus ma byas pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'dus ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ chos
208b5: thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos thams cad ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad
208b6: ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tsher ba
208b7: dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / kha na mtho ba dang bcas pa dang /
208b8: kha na ma tho ba dang / med pa dang / zag pa dang / bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa

209a1: dang / rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams dang / 'khor pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa yang ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir she na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir // tsha dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nam grangs des na/ chos thams
209a2: cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags/ gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang mngon par grub pa'i ram
209a3: par shes pa de gang lags/ shes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
209a4: tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin
209a5: khu rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gzugs dang sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos
209a6: rnams ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po/ mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad kyi bar du yang mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa
209a7: po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnams grangs des na/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams ni mngon par ma grub pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang
209a8: khyod 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir gang mngon par ma 'grub pa de/ gzugs ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags shes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu

209b1: de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa gang yin pa de la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med do// gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa gang yin pa de la gzhan
209b2: ru 'gyur ba med do/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa gang yin pa de la skye ba med cing / 'jig pa med do// gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa de la
209b3: gzhan du 'gyur ba med do/ / chos thams cad kyi bar du rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gang dag rang bzhin gyis stong pa de dag la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med do// gang dag la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa de dag la gzhan du 'gyur ba med de/ rnam
209b4: grangs des na/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir ci
209b5: mngon par mthub par mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar mngon par ma grub pa gang yin pa de ni
209b6: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par ma grub pa ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ tshe dang ldan pa
209b7: shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ kho bos 'di skad du/ ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam zhes smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bug
209b8: yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir mngon par ma grub pa las gud na yang gang byang chub kyi slad du spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su ma mchis lags so zhes smras zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang

210a1: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ mngon par ma grub pa yang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa
210a2: dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni gnyis bu med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// mngon par ma grub pa las gud na gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / mngon par ma grub pa las gud na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
210a3: rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par grub pa dang / gzugs de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
210a4: rnam par shes pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// de bzhin du mngon par ma grub pa las gud na chos thams cad kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar de ni gnyis su med cing
210a5: gnyis su dbyer med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ mngon par ma grub pa las gdan gang byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa// bam po bcu bdun pa
210a6: tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi 'gong zhing / yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur la/ mi skrag me dang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub
210a7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa lags par reg par ba'i'o zhes sgra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa bA ri'i bri 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos thams cad g.yo ba med par yang
210a8: dag par rjes su mthong zhing chos thams cad zilam lta bu dang / sbrum lta bu dang / smig rtu lta bu dang/ brag chag bu dang / mig yong sa bu dang / gzugs brnyan sa bu dang / sprul pa lta bur yang dag par rjes su mthong te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bre rnam grangs des

210b1: na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni// bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol
210b2: to/ / bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog pa de'i tshe/ gzugs khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par
210b3: zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni gzugs so// zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so// de'i tshe tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa khas mi len cing / mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi
210b4: bgyid cing / 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so// de bzhin du de'i tshe/ mig khas mi len cing / mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni mig go zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid
210b5: lags so/ / de bzhin du de'i tshe rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing 'di ni yid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so// de'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa
210b6: khas me len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so// de bzhin du de'i tshe tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du
210b7: sbyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa khas mi len cing mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi babyed cing / 'di ni shes rab kyi sa
210b8: rol du phyin pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ / de'i tshe nang stong pa nyid las me len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing 'di ni ning stong pa nyid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so// de

211a1: bzhin du de'i tshe/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du khas mi len cing / mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid
211a2: lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams khas mi len cing / mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par
211a3: mi bgyid cing 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs
211a4: rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad pas mi len
211a5: cing / mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
211a6: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad khas mi len cing / mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par shen par mi bgyid cing / 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
211a7: so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin du phung po dang
211a8: khams dang / skye mched rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / pha rol du phyin pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang /

211b1: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i srad du'o// de ci'i slang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni ma skyes pa ste/ gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa gzugs ma lags pa'i slang du'o// de ltar na gzugs
211b2: dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer sa mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
211b3: dang / rnam par shes pa'i skyeb ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so// mig gi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni mig ma lag so// ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni yid ma lags so// sbyin pa'i pha
211b4: rol du phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ma lags so/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab
211b5: kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ / de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// nang stong
211b6: pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags so/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags ste/ de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
211b7: pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na dran pa
211b8: pang gzhag pa rnams dang skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ / de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / mi 'jigs pa

212a1: rnams dang mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi chos skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags te/ de
212a2: ltar na sangs kyi chos rnams dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
212a3: rnams ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni ma skyes pa ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na de bzhin nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma
212a4: mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du de bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de
212a5: bzhin nyid ma lags so/ / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi skye ba ma
212a6: mchis pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ma lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad bu'o// bcom
212a7: ldan 'das byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags ste/ de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing
212a8: gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ / de ci'i slad du she na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad de ste/ de'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni ga

212b1: su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni mi rtag pa ste/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
212b2: shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ de ltar na phung po rnams dang / 'gre ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig
212b3: ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o// khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag ni khams dang / skye mched rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis shing
212b4: gnyis su dbyar ma mchis lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ma lags te/ de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su
212b5: dbyer ma mchis lags so/ / de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags/
212b6: pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma lags te/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/
212b7: mang pe ma lags pa'i slad duste/ de'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa'i 'grib pa gang 'gas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de
212b8: lhang nanang stong pa nyid dang 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa

213a1: gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags so/ / de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang
213a2: 'grib pa da ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang
213a3: lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni
213a4: gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dran
213a5: panye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags so/ / yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni lam ma lags te/ de ltar
213a6: nal ma dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma ma ris lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang pom gas 'i slad du/ de'i sladadu lam gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni lam ma lags/
213a7: so// de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi 'grub pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags
213a8: te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyar ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i

213b1: slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gang yang gzugs shes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so// de bzhin du
213b2: gang yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so// gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de yang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su
213b3: bgyis pa lags so/ / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ gnyis su med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor pa'idi skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
213b4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa chos 'di dag la ni ji ltar nye bar rtog/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gang yin/ nye bar rtog pa ni gang
213b5: yin/ / rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang khyod 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub gang yin pa nyid sems dpa' yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o//
213b6: byang chub des kyang chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te/ chos de dag la mngon par zhen pa yang med do// chos gang dag gi rnam pa shes she na/ gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la yang mngon par zhen pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
213b7: dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la yang mngon par zhen pa med do// de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi rnam pa shes te/ de la yang mngon
213b8: par zhen pa med do/ / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la yang mngon par zhen pa med do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan

214a1: ba rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi rnam pa gang yin/ / rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bri rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis chos rnams 'dzin pa ste/ 'di lta ste rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags
214a2: gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams dang gzugs rnams sam/ sgra rnams sam/ dri rnams sam/ re rnams sam/ reg bya rnams sam/ chos rnams sam/ nang dang phyi'i chos rnams su 'dzin pa
214a3: de ni chos thams cad kyi rnam pa zhes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ring song ba ste/ de'i
214a4: phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o/ / gang las ring du song zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten ci de 'brel bar 'byung ba las ring du song / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / lta bar
214a5: gyur pa thams cad las ring du song / 'gro ba drug las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam
214a6: gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// dang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang
214a7: dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ring
214a8: du song ba zhes bya'o/ / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ba cu rgyad po dag las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o// rnam

214b1: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ring du song ba zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan
214b2: shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du nye bar rtag pa ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bri 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar
214b3: mi tog go/ gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ gzugs stong zhes
214b4: bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ gzugs dben zhes bya ba
214b5: dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes
214b6: bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi tog go rnams par shes pazhi zhes bya ba dag pa nyi zhes tha par nye bar ma rtog go// rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / me stong zhes bya ba nye bar me rtog go// nam
214b7: par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / tshan ma med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog
214b8: go/ / de bzhin du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du byin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi she ba pad zhan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa rtag ces bya ba dang /

215a1: rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin du sbyar te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang /
215a2: mi steng zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin du nang song pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya ba
215a3: bar mi rtog go/ / de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong shes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go// dben zhes bya ba dang / mi
215a4: dben zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go/ de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin du sbyar te/ yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs
215a5: nams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs
215a6: kyi sgo thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma ni zhes bya ba dang / stong shes
215a7: bya ba dang / mi sdong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / ber zhe bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
215a8: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog par byed do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs kyi me skyes pa gang lags pa de ni

215b1: gzugs pa lags so/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so// de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams
215b2: dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad
215b3: dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma ma chis pa gang lags pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags so zhes smra// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs
215b4: kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
215b5: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa gang
215b6: yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ma yin te/ skye ba med do//
215b7: tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
215b8: pas stong ngo / / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes

216a1: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i de nang stong pa 'di ni dang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
216a2: stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ dngos
216a3: po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong
216a4: pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
216a5: pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa
216a6: roni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang
216a7: ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa
216a8: pa lags so/ / de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten 'brel par 'byung ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa

216b1: rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags shes zer/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs
216b2: gang yin pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa
216b3: yang ma yin zhing / gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong
216b4: nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin te/ de ltar na 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang
216b5: pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhing / gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam
216b6: grangs des na/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib
216b7: gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ / shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ khyod 'di skad du gang yang gzugs shes bgyi bde ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so// de bzhin du tsho rab dang / 'ang shes dang /
216b8: 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so// gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de yang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so zhes sna/ rab 'byor

217a1: kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri 'a bu 'di ltar skye ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin la/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma yidang/ skye ba med pa nyid kyang gzugs so// gzugs nyid kyang skye ba med pa'o// skye ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
217a2: 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang yang gzugs shes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin
217a3: no/ / gang yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no// khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
217a4: chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan
217a5: ma yin la/ skye ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis
217a6: su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing chos de dag la de ltar
217a7: nye bar rtog par bgyid pa de'i tshe shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so//
217a8: shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ bdag gi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po

217b1: dang / mthong ba po'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so// de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i skye ba ma mchis par mthong lags so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
217b2: du phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ / de bzhin du shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtar gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha ro
217b3: byin skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ / shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ nang stong pa nyid kyi skyeb ma mchis pa mthong lags so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dngos po med pa'i da ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so// shin dunam
217b4: par dag pa'i slad du/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu
217b5: dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/
217b6: so so'i skye bo'i skye ba ma mchis pa mtheng lags so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams
217b7: dag lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byad
217b8: chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor

218a1: kyis smras pa'i don kho bos shes pa ltar na/ gzugs ni skye ba med pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang skye ba med pa yin/ khams rnams skye ba med pa yin/ skye mched rnams skye ba med pa yin/
218a2: rten de 'brel bar chung ba skye ba med pa yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams skye ba med pa yin/ spyong pa nyid thams cad skye ba med pa yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcun 'dun skye ba med pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sa
218a3: dmas skye ba med pa yin/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad sde pa med pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa yin// so so'i skye bo yang skye
218a4: ba med pa yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang skye ba med pa yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom
218a5: pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba
218a6: med pa yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyang skye ba med la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du yang skye ba med pa yin na ni/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nyan thos kyis kyang / nyan thos kyi byang chub thob zin par mi 'gyur 'am/ de bzhin
218a7: du so so'i skye bos kyang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin par mi 'gyur 'am/ 'gro ba rnam pa lnga yang tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems
